3: Dammit, there are too many of them!
Taking advantage of the chaos, Lucia makes her way to the drop zone of her new frame.
Rosetta ejects from her centaur frame as a pair of luminescent wings unfold on her back.
Her power is off the charts! But... her corruption level is already at critical...
This is the power of a humanoid hybrid Construct...
No, we can't let her get near Lucia! Cover her, Liv!
Diana's lance glides right above Evan's head, sending the group of Corrupted flying in the air and scattering onto the ground.
That was very brave of you, Evan.
The Forest Guards have arrived! Reform the defense line!
